CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 17, 1962, pg. 17 reads: "Finished Man's Job - As a salute to a job well done over a period of 20 years, when he saved the city thousands of dollars in lawsuits, Atty. Thomas Barton is shown, with Mrs. Barton, as Governor David Lawrence and a host of Pittsburgh attorneys gathered at the Penn-Sheraton to pay tribute and wish him God-speed on his retirement. -Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: David L. Lawrence speaking at podium between Mrs., and Atty. Thomas Barton, honoree, seated on left, and unknown man seated on right, posed at head banquet table in the Penn Sheraton Hotel
CatSubject_tab: Lawrence, David Leo, 1889-1966.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Penn Sheraton Hotel (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Hotels--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Interiors--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Flowers--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Tables--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Barton, Thomas E.
